A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great\, zigzaggy visuals\, communicating the sometimes complex action scenes fast and efficiently. Some cool individual scenes\, and the set piece with Rey and Kylo doesn't disappoint. Almost everything else is a total mess. The biggest problem here is time. Not enough of it for the bible-long bullet point list that is the story beats of this film. This is a season of television crammed into two and a half hours. Few of the character beats resonate because of this\, and I am left feeling nothing.
